author: jm
msg: backport link-to-more-info for rules page to 3.1.x

author: vinoski
msg: changes to support the assembly:directory goal
* Allow the assembly:directory goal to be used to create an install
directory under the target directory. This directory basically contains
the contents of the qpid-java-bin tar/zip artifacts, and is suitable
as a spot from which to execute the broker or other qpid applications
directly, by setting QPID_HOME to point there and adding the bin directory
* Reformatted this pom file to 4-space indents, to match the other pom files
